Package org.drasyl.util.scheduler

Class LoggingScheduler

java.lang.Object
io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler
org.drasyl.util.scheduler.DrasylScheduler
org.drasyl.util.scheduler.LoggingScheduler
public class LoggingScheduler extends DrasylScheduler
A DrasylScheduler that logs all tasks via Logger. By default, all events are logged at DEBUG level.
